# Graphing Examples

## Import Libraries
```{python}
# import libraries
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import plotly.express as px
import plotly.graph_objects as go
```

## load data
```{python}
df = px.data.tips()
df.head()
```

## Matplotlib Example
```{python}
# matplotlib example
plt.scatter(data = df, x = 'total_bill', y = 'tip')
```

## Seaborn Example
```{python}
# seaborn example
sns.scatterplot(data = df, x = 'total_bill', y = 'tip')
```

## Plotly Example
```{python}
# plotly example
fig = px.scatter(df, x='total_bill', y="tip", color='time',
                 symbol='sex', size='size', facet_row='day',
                 facet_col='time')
 
fig.show()
```

## Plotly Interactive Example
```{python}
# plotly interactivity example I
plot = go.Figure(data=[go.Scatter(
    x=df['day'],
    y=df['tip'],
    mode='markers',)
])
 
# Add dropdown
plot.update_layout(
    updatemenus=[
        dict(
            type="buttons",
            direction="left",
            buttons=list([
                dict(
                    args=["type", "scatter"],
                    label="Scatter Plot",
                    method="restyle"
                ),
                dict(
                    args=["type", "bar"],
                    label="Bar Chart",
                    method="restyle"
                )
            ]),
        ),
    ]
)
 
plot.show()
```
